summary: THERE IS NOISE POOOOK SOUND WHEN I PRESS THE BRAKE PEDAL.  IT COME FROM THE  BREAKING SYSTEM. MY CAR HAS ONLY 13467 MILES ON IT.THIS SOUND COMES ONCE  WHEN I  PRESS BRAKE PEDAL. I HEAR THE NOISE WHEN THE VEHICLE IS BETWEEN 10-  40 MILE PER HOUR SPEED. TOOK IT TO SACRAMENTO HYUNDAI  FOUND THE DEFECT STILL IN GARAGE.   ALSO WHEN PRESS THE BRAKE PEDAL SLOW RELEASE OF THE BREAK.
